fields.name: datetime(UTC)
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time of the start of the 300 second-long interval, the N_CCN value is given for, in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00. [UTC]

fields.name: latitude(degree N)
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: Latitude of the ship's position in decimal degrees North at the start of the averaged time period. [decimal degrees north]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Average latitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval

fields.name: longitude(degree E)
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the ship's position in decimal degrees East at the start of the averaged time period. [decimal degrees east]
fields.x_spi_cf_attribute: Average longitude of the ship on which the measurements took place, during the five-minute time interval

fields.name: hygroscopicity_parameter_of_cloud_condensation_nuclei_at_stp_in_air
fields.title: Hygroscopicity parameter of cloud condensation nuclei at STP in air
fields.description: Hygroscopicity parameter kappa at given supersaturation as averaged value for time period from time stamp to 300 seconds after the time stamp. [-]

fields.name: supersaturation(%)
fields.title: Supersaturation
fields.description: Level of supersaturation inside the measurement instrument for the time period the kappa value is given for. [percent]
